phrs.translation: 画匠, 画师, 林特纳

sentences.sentence: I am expecting myself more than a limner of copying my work. I can not satisfy a series of work for the rest of my life. I accept doctor Liu Xiaochun's speaking me of being dynamic in thinking.
sentences.translation: 我希望自己不是一个复制自己作品的画匠，所以我总不能长久地驻足，去画一个系列就一辈子了，我承认刘骁纯博士说我思想活跃。
